title: Looking for members for odysee 3 and 2 augments missions
body:
Hi, im looking for 4 members to do the 3 and 2 augments missions in odysee as they seem kind of impossible with randoms.

Requirements:
- Have at least cleared onslaught allready
- Time. This is probably gonna take a few tries
- The sufficient augments. As far as i have seen so far, 4x Yas with Temperst and Wandering and 1 Malph with Relentless and Onslaught seems to be the easiest way to do the mission. You should be able to play with these setups. Im open for other comps though. 

Add me. IGN: CptnF

replies.body: why u are on the german board?
